pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Tools for Topological Data Analysis // Tools for the statistical analysis of persistent homology and for density clustering. For that, this package provides an R interface for the efficient algorithms of the C++ libraries 'GUDHI' https://project.inria.fr/gudhi/software/, 'Dionysus' https://www.mrzv.org/software/dionysus/, and 'PHAT' https://bitbucket.org/phat-code/phat/. This package also implements the methods in Fasy et al. (2014) doi:10.1214/14-AOS1252 and Chazal et al. (2014) doi:10.1145/2582112.2582128 for analyzing the statistical significance of persistent homology features.
